trans-unit.source: Provides the page adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser.
trans-unit.target: 提供页适配器类，用于设置专门设计为在启动 Openwave 的浏览器的 WML 设备适配器。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlPageAdapter"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回适用于给定适配器的文本编写器。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 适用于给定适配器的文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 评估是否设备适配器集适用于指定的请求。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|Not applicable.|
trans-unit.target: |类 |返回 |首选呈现类型 |检查 JavaScript 属性值 | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|检查是否<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>属性的值是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或者<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。 |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>属性返回`true`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|检查是否<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>属性的值是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或者<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。 |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>属性返回`false`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|检查是否<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>属性的值是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>或者<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>。 |Not applicable.|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设备适配器设置将应用到指定的请求;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
